br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens

Class ErrorScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens.BaseScreen
      • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens.ErrorScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class ErrorScreen
extends BaseScreen
    A screen which informs the user about an error occurred during any moment. It succinctly explains about what happened and which actions the user should take according to the thrown exception. Experienced users may also view additional, technical details.
